ai-patthana16.84:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.84:0.3_0: Seeing for one who is attached to joyful
ai-patthana16.84:1.1_0: One who has not obtained reverence for someone who doesn’t give rise to joy in those without rapture.
ai-patthana16.84:1.1_1: One who has not covered with kindness, doesn’t give rise to joy in those without rapture. ...
ai-patthana16.84:1.1_2: Such things don’t arise for someone who doesn’t give rise to rapture. They don’t have moderation in one who isn’t mindful.
ai-patthana16.84:2.1_0: One who has not grasped the teaching of an impingement that doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without.
ai-patthana16.84:2.1_1: One who has not got rid of repulsion gives rise to joy in those without trouble.
ai-patthana16.84:2.1_2: Such things don’t give rise to unsuitableness, nor are they for the sake of substantively.
ai-patthana16.84:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
